verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: reporters] [ARG1: that he suggested the elimination of all tariffs , trade barriers , and subsidies during a meeting with G7 leaders . The idea comes just weeks after Trump slapped massive tariffs on US allies , including many G7 members , and pushed America close to a trade war] .
